howTo.title: How to Use Gition
howTo.subtitle: A complete guide to getting started with your documentation and task management workspace
howTo.quickStartDescription: Get up and running in 30 seconds
howTo.step3Description: Your browser will open automatically and you can start exploring your workspace
howTo.serveDirectory: Serve a specific directory (defaults to current directory)
howTo.workingWithDocsDescription: Create and organize your markdown files
howTo.documentMetadataDescription: Add structured metadata to your files using YAML frontmatter:
howTo.taskManagementDescription: Manage task files and their contained subtasks with hierarchical organization
howTo.tasksAreMdxFiles: Tasks = MDX files (appear in main list/kanban)
howTo.subtasksAreCheckboxes: Subtasks = Checkbox items within files (appear in detail views)
howTo.creatingSubtasksDescription: Add subtasks within your task files using standard checkbox syntax:
howTo.taskFileMetadataDescription: Task files use frontmatter for metadata:
howTo.subtaskInlineMetadataDescription: Subtasks can have inline metadata for detailed tracking:
howTo.subtaskReferencesDescription: Subtasks can reference other task files to create relationships:
howTo.taskFileOrganizationDescription: Organize task files in a structured hierarchy:
howTo.eachMdxFileNote: Each .mdx file is a task containing multiple subtasks (checkboxes)
howTo.taskListDescription: Shows task files with collapsible subtask previews
howTo.kanbanBoardDescription: Displays subtasks organized by status (Todo, In Progress, Done)
howTo.taskDetailsDescription: Click any task file to view full MDX content with subtask components
howTo.progressTracking: Progress Tracking: Automatic subtask completion percentage per task file
howTo.crossReferences: Cross-References: See which subtasks reference other task files
howTo.mdxRendering: MDX Rendering: Full markdown support for task files with custom components
howTo.realTimeUpdates: Real-time Updates: Changes to task files and subtasks reflect immediately
howTo.metadataValidation: Metadata Validation: Structured frontmatter for tasks and inline data for subtasks
